name: FDS / Friday File System
description:
Boilerplate to improve Designer and Stakeholder collaboration.


Improve your designer and stakeholder collaboration with Friday File System by setting up a shared language that defines a standard way of organising and setting up your Figma files, pages and ui designs.


The shared language will help the stakeholders understand how design files are organised and documented, so they can go and find anything whenever they need it without bugging designers. The documentation in best cases eliminates the requirement for tedious walkthroughs and going through multiple tools to track down design decisions. 


This boilerplate includes:

  • Figma File Setup Template
  • Design Page Template
  • File Thumbnail Component
  • Ready to use Status Components
  • Comment Components


You can publish this file within your Figma design team to make the ready-made components accessible for everyone
